Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' followed by 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that have 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' before 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities per case
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities grouped by the last value of code

Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities that precede 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in relation to 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in the most common process variant
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities that lead to a manuscript being accepted ('RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'Unassign Editor' occurs

Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' followed by 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities that are followed by 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' again (reassignments)
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' that lead to 'SW-Reviewer No Response'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in relation to the total number of activities in the longest process variant

Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities that occur after 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days'
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities that result in a 'SW-EIC Reject' decision

Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases
